hints.startsWith: Il Pokemon segreto inizia con la lettera:

intro.welcome: Welcome to the world of POKÃ©MON!
intro.text: Every day a wild POKÃ©MON from gen 1-3 will be hiding and its your job as a POKÃ©MON TRAINER to catch (guess) it!

1.title: Guess One:
1.text: Guess any random POKÃ©MON from gen 1-3 , since we currently have no clues. We will guess SQUIRTLE.

2.title: 2. Guess:
2.text: We now know that we are looking for a BLUE POKÃ©MON. Furthermore the POKÃ©MON has to be in its final evolution stage. Lastly, the POKÃ©MON is NOT  from gen 1. Let's guess HERACROSS since it matches these characteristics.

3.title: 3. Guess:
3.text: Now we know the hidden POKÃ©MON MUST be from gen 3. Since the hidden POKÃ©MON cannot be a WATER TYPE, this leaves only a couple of possible options Let's guess SALAMANCE

4.title: 4. Guess:
4.text: We now know that the POKÃ©MON lives in ROUGH TERRAIN and is in evolution stage 3. This leaves only one POKÃ©MON; METAGROSS.
